00049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 // Function: EndpointDesignDiagram()
00051 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 EndpointDesignDiagram::EndpointDesignDiagram(LibraryInterface* lh, MainWindow* mainWnd,
00053                                              GenericEditProvider& editProvider,
00054                                              EndpointDesignWidget* parent) : QGraphicsScene(parent), lh_(lh),
00055                                                                              mainWnd_(mainWnd),
00056                                                                              parent_(parent),
00057                                                                              editProvider_(editProvider),
00058                                                                              system_(), designConf_(),
00059                                                                              nodeIDFactory_(),
00060                                                                              layout_(), mode_(MODE_SELECT),
00061                                                                              tempConnEndpoint_(0),
00062                                                                              tempConnection_(0),
00063                                                                              tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_(0),
00064                                                                              highlightedEndPoint_(0),
00065                                                                              instanceNames_(), locked_(false)
00066                                                                          
00067 {
00068     setSceneRect(0, 0, 100000, 100000);
00069 
00070     connect(this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00071             this, SLOT(onComponentInstanceAdded(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00072     connect(this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00073             this, SLOT(onComponentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00074 }

00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 // Function: ~EndpointDesignDiagram()
00078 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 EndpointDesignDiagram::~EndpointDesignDiagram()
00080 {
00081     // Delete connections.
00082     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, items())
00083     {
00084         if (item->type() == EndpointConnection::Type)
00085         {
00086             removeItem(item);
00087             delete item;
00088         }
00089     }
00090 }

00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 // Function: setDesign()
00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 bool EndpointDesignDiagram::setDesign(QSharedPointer<Component> system)
00096 {
00097     Q_ASSERT(system != 0);
00098     system_ = system;
00099 
00100     VLNV designVLNV = system->getHierRef("kts_sys_ref");
00101 
00102     // The received type is always VLNV::DESIGN so it must be asked from the
00103     // library handler to make sure the type is correct.
00104     designVLNV.setType(lh_->getDocumentType(designVLNV));
00105 
00106     if (!designVLNV.isValid())
00107     {
00108         emit errorMessage(tr("System %1 did not contain a hierarchical view").arg(
00109                           system->getVlnv()->getName()));
00110         return false;
00111     }
00112 
00113     QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00114 
00115     // Check if the component contains a direct reference to a design.
00116     if (designVLNV.getType() == VLNV::DESIGN)
00117     {
00118         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(designVLNV);   
00119         design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00120     }
00121     // Otherwise check if the component had reference to a design configuration.
00122     else if (designVLNV.getType() == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION)
00123     {
00124         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(designVLNV);
00125         designConf_ = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00126 
00127         designVLNV = designConf_->getDesignRef();
00128 
00129         if (designVLNV.isValid())
00130         {
00131             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(designVLNV);       
00132             design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00133         }
00134 
00135         // If design configuration did not contain a reference to a design.
00136         if (!design)
00137         {
00138             emit errorMessage(tr("System %1 did not contain a hierarchical view").arg(
00139                               system->getVlnv()->getName()));
00140             return false;
00141         }
00142     }
00143 
00144     // Update the design.
00145     updateSystemDesign(lh_, QFileInfo(lh_->getPath(designVLNV)).path(), system->getHierRef("kts_hw_ref"), *design);
00146 
00147     // Create the column layout.
00148     layout_ = QSharedPointer<SystemColumnLayout>(new SystemColumnLayout(this));
00149     connect(layout_.data(), SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00150 
00151     if (design->getColumns().isEmpty())
00152     {
00153         layout_->addColumn("SW Components");
00154         layout_->addColumn("SW Components");
00155     }
00156     else
00157     {
00158         foreach(Design::ColumnDesc desc, design->getColumns())
00159         {
00160             layout_->addColumn(desc.name);
00161         }
00162     }
00163 
00164     unsigned int colIndex = 0;
00165 
00166     // Add component instances.
00167     foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, design->getComponentInstances())
00168     {
00169         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComponent = lh_->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00170 
00171         if (!libComponent)
00172         {
00173             emit errorMessage(tr("The component %1 was not found in the library").arg(
00174                               instance.componentRef.getName()).arg(design->getVlnv()->getName()));
00175             continue;
00176         }
00177 
00178         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComponent.staticCast<Component>();
00179 
00180         int id = instance.mcapiNodeID;
00181 
00182         // If the id is not set, generate a new ID. TODO: The id should be set in the generation phase.
00183         if (id == -1)
00184         {
00185             id = nodeIDFactory_.getID();
00186         }
00187         else
00188         {
00189             nodeIDFactory_.usedID(id);
00190         }
00191 
00192         MappingComponentItem* item = new MappingComponentItem(this, lh_, component, instance.instanceName,
00193                                                               instance.displayName, instance.description,
00194                                                               instance.configurableElementValues, id);
00195         item->setImported(instance.imported);
00196         connect(item, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00197 
00198         // Check if the position is not found.
00199         if (instance.position.isNull())
00200         {
00201             layout_->getColumns().at(colIndex)->addItem(item);
00202             colIndex = 1 - colIndex;
00203         }
00204         else
00205         {
00206             item->setPos(instance.position);
00207 
00208             SystemColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(instance.position);
00209 
00210             if (column != 0)
00211             {
00212                 column->addItem(item, true);
00213             }
00214             else
00215             {
00216                 layout_->getColumns().at(colIndex)->addItem(item);
00217                 colIndex = 1 - colIndex;
00218             }
00219         }
00220 
00221         instanceNames_.append(instance.instanceName);
00222     }
00223 
00224     // Add interconnections.
00225     foreach (Design::Interconnection interconnection, design->getInterconnections())
00226     {
00227         // Find the referenced mapping components.
00228         MappingComponentItem* comp1 = getMappingComponent(interconnection.interface1.componentRef);
00229         
00230         if (comp1 == 0)
00231         {
00232             emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 was not found within the design").arg(
00233                               interconnection.interface1.componentRef));
00234             continue;
00235         }
00236 
00237         MappingComponentItem* comp2 = getMappingComponent(interconnection.interface2.componentRef);
00238 
00239         if (comp2 == 0)
00240         {
00241             emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 was not found within the design").arg(
00242                 interconnection.interface2.componentRef));
00243             continue;
00244         }
00245 
00246         // find the port of the first referenced component
00247         EndpointItem* endpoint1 = comp1->getEndpoint(interconnection.interface1.busRef);
00248 
00249         if (endpoint1 == 0)
00250         {
00251             emit errorMessage(tr("Endpoint %1 was not found within component %2").arg(
00252                 interconnection.interface1.busRef).arg(interconnection.interface1.componentRef));
00253             continue;
00254         }
00255 
00256         // find the port of the second referenced component
00257         EndpointItem* endpoint2 = comp2->getEndpoint(interconnection.interface2.busRef);
00258 
00259         if (endpoint2 == 0)
00260         {
00261             emit errorMessage(tr("Endpoint %1 was not found within component %2").arg(
00262                 interconnection.interface2.busRef).arg(interconnection.interface2.componentRef));
00263             continue;
00264         }
00265 
00266         // If both components and their ports are found an interconnection can be created.
00267         EndpointConnection* conn = new EndpointConnection(endpoint1, endpoint2, true);
00268         conn->setRoute(interconnection.route);
00269         connect(conn, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00270         
00271         addItem(conn);
00272     }
00273 
00274     return true;
00275 }

00302 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00303 // Function: addMappingComponent()
00304 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00305 void EndpointDesignDiagram::addMappingComponent(SystemColumn* column, QPointF const& pos)
00306 {
00307     Q_ASSERT(column != 0);
00308 
00309     // Create a component model without a valid vlnv.
00310     QSharedPointer<Component> comp = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component());
00311     comp->setVlnv(VLNV());
00312     
00313     // Create the mapping component graphics item.
00314     MappingComponentItem* item = new MappingComponentItem(this, lh_, comp, createInstanceName("unnamed"),
00315                                                           QString(), QString(), QMap<QString, QString>(),
00316                                                           nodeIDFactory_.getID());
00317     item->setPos(pos);
00318     connect(item, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00319 
00320     // Create an undo command and execute it.
00321     QSharedPointer<MappingCompAddCommand> cmd(new MappingCompAddCommand(column, item));
00322     connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00323         this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00324     connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00325         this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00326 
00327     editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
00328 }

00330 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00331 // Function: drawBackground
00332 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00333 void EndpointDesignDiagram::drawBackground(QPainter* painter, QRectF const& rect)
00334 {
00335     painter->setWorldMatrixEnabled(true);
00336     painter->setBrush(Qt::lightGray);
00337 
00338     qreal left = int(rect.left()) - (int(rect.left()) % GridSize );
00339     qreal top = int(rect.top()) - (int(rect.top()) % GridSize );
00340 
00341     for (qreal x = left; x < rect.right(); x += GridSize ) {
00342         for (qreal y = top; y < rect.bottom(); y += GridSize )
00343             painter->drawPoint(x, y);
00344     }
00345 }

00361 
00362     if (mode_ != MODE_SELECT)

00365     }
00366

00370 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00371 // Function: dragEnterEvent()
00372 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00373 void EndpointDesignDiagram::dragEnterEvent(QGraphicsSceneDragDropEvent * event)
00374 {
00375     dragSW_ = false;
00376 
00377     if (!locked_ && event->mimeData()->hasFormat("data/vlnvptr"))
00378     {
00379         event->acceptProposedAction();
00380 
00381         VLNV *vlnv;
00382         memcpy(&vlnv, event->mimeData()->data("data/vlnvptr").data(), sizeof(vlnv));
00383 
00384         if (vlnv->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT)
00385         {
00386             // Determine the component type.
00387             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*vlnv);
00388             QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00389 
00390             // component with given vlnv was not found
00391             if (!comp) {
00392                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component with the VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in the library.").arg(
00393                     vlnv->getVendor()).arg(
00394                     vlnv->getLibrary()).arg(
00395                     vlnv->getName()).arg(
00396                     vlnv->getVersion()));
00397                 return;
00398             }
00399 
00400             // Check if the firmness does not match with the edited component.
00401             if (comp->getComponentImplementation() != KactusAttribute::KTS_SW)
00402             {
00403                 return;
00404             }
00405 
00406             dragSWType_ = comp->getComponentSWType();
00407             dragSW_ = true;
00408             comp.clear();
00409         }
00410         else if (vlnv->getType() == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION)
00411         {
00412             // TODO: Needed?
00413         }
00414     }
00415 }
00416 
00417 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00418 // Function: dragMoveEvent()
00419 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00420 void EndpointDesignDiagram::dragMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneDragDropEvent * event)
00421 {
00422     if (dragSW_)
00423     {
00424         // Find the top-most item under the cursor.
00425         QGraphicsItem* item = 0;
00426         QList<QGraphicsItem*> itemList = items(event->scenePos());
00427 
00428         if (!itemList.empty())
00429         {
00430             item = itemList.front();
00431 
00432             if (item->type() == QGraphicsTextItem::Type)
00433             {
00434                 item = item->parentItem();
00435             }
00436         }
00437 
00438         if (item != 0 &&
00439             ((dragSWType_ == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS && item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type) ||
00440              (dragSWType_ == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM && item->type() == PlatformPlaceholderItem::Type) ||
00441              (dragSWType_ == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION && item->type() == AppPlaceholderItem::Type)))
00442         {
00443             event->setDropAction(Qt::CopyAction);
00444         }
00445         else
00446         {
00447             event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
00448         }
00449 
00450         event->accept();
00451     }
00452     else
00453     {
00454         event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
00455     }
00456 }

00463     dragSW_ = false;
00464 }

00466 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00467 // Function: dropEvent()
00468 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00469 void EndpointDesignDiagram::dropEvent(QGraphicsSceneDragDropEvent *event)
00470 {
00471     // Check if the dragged item was a valid one.
00472     if (dragSW_)
00473     {
00474         QList<QGraphicsItem*> itemList = items(event->scenePos());
00475 
00476         // Retrieve the vlnv.
00477         VLNV *vlnv;
00478         memcpy(&vlnv, event->mimeData()->data("data/vlnvptr").data(), sizeof(vlnv));
00479 
00480         // Create the component model.
00481         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*vlnv);
00482         QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00483 
00484         // Set the instance name for the new component instance.
00485         QString instanceName = createInstanceName(comp);
00486 
00487         if (dragSWType_ == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS ||
00488             dragSWType_ == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM)
00489         {
00490             // Find the bottom-most item under the cursor.
00491             MappingComponentItem* mappingCompItem = 0;
00492             
00493             if (!itemList.empty())
00494             {
00495                 mappingCompItem = dynamic_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(itemList.back());
00496                 Q_ASSERT(mappingCompItem != 0);
00497             }
00498 
00499             if (dragSWType_ == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS)
00500             {
00501                 // Create the application item.
00502                 ProgramEntityItem* item = new ProgramEntityItem(comp, instanceName,
00503                                                                 QString(), QString(),
00504                                                                 QMap<QString, QString>());
00505                 item->setPos(snapPointToGrid(event->scenePos()));
00506                 connect(item, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00507 
00508                 // Create the undo command and execute it.
00509                 QSharedPointer<ProgramEntityAddCommand> cmd(new ProgramEntityAddCommand(mappingCompItem, item));
00510                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00511                     this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00512                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00513                     this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00514 
00515                 editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
00516             }
00517             else
00518             {
00519                 // Create the platform component item.
00520                 PlatformComponentItem* item = new PlatformComponentItem(comp, instanceName,
00521                                                                         QString(), QString(),
00522                                                                         QMap<QString, QString>(),
00523                                                                         mappingCompItem);
00524                 connect(item, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00525 
00526                 // Create the undo command and execute it.
00527                 QSharedPointer<PlatformCompAddCommand> cmd(new PlatformCompAddCommand(mappingCompItem, item));
00528                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00529                     this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00530                 connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00531                     this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00532 
00533                 editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
00534             }
00535         }
00536         else if (dragSWType_ == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION)
00537         {
00538             // Find the program entity item.
00539             ProgramEntityItem* progEntity = 0;
00540 
00541             for (int i = 0; i < itemList.size(); ++i)
00542             {
00543                 if (itemList[i]->type() == ProgramEntityItem::Type)
00544                 {
00545                     progEntity = static_cast<ProgramEntityItem*>(itemList[i]);
00546                     break;
00547                 }
00548             }
00549 
00550             Q_ASSERT(progEntity != 0);
00551 
00552             // Create the application item.
00553             ApplicationItem* item = new ApplicationItem(comp, instanceName, QString(),
00554                                                         QString(), QMap<QString, QString>(),
00555                                                         progEntity);
00556             connect(item, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)),
00557                     this, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00558 
00559             // Create the undo command and execute it.
00560             QSharedPointer<ApplicationAddCommand> cmd(new ApplicationAddCommand(progEntity, item));
00561             connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00562                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00563             connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00564                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00565 
00566             editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
00567         }
00568     }
00569 }
00570 
00571 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00572 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00573 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00574 void EndpointDesignDiagram::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00575 {
00576     // If other than left button was pressed return back to select mode.
00577     if (event->button() != Qt::LeftButton)
00578     {
00579         for (int i = 0 ; i < tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.size(); ++i)
00580         {
00581             tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.at(i)->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00582         }
00583         tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.clear();
00584 
00585         // Destroy the connection that was being drawn.
00586         if (tempConnection_) {
00587             delete tempConnection_;
00588             tempConnection_ = 0;
00589             tempConnEndpoint_ = 0;
00590         }
00591 
00592         // Disable highlights from all endpoints.
00593         disableHighlight();
00594 
00595         setMode(MODE_SELECT);
00596         return;
00597     }
00598 
00599     if (mode_ == MODE_CONNECT)
00600     {
00601         // Deselect all items.
00602         clearSelection();
00603 
00604         // Try to snap to an MCAPI endpoint.
00605         tempConnEndpoint_ = DiagramUtil::snapToItem<EndpointItem>(event->scenePos(), this, GridSize);
00606 
00607         if (tempConnEndpoint_ == 0 || tempConnEndpoint_->isConnected())
00608         {
00609             return;
00610         }
00611 
00612         // Create a new temporary connection while the user is drawing.
00613         tempConnection_ = new EndpointConnection(tempConnEndpoint_->scenePos(),
00614                                                  tempConnEndpoint_->getDirectionVector(),
00615                                                  tempConnEndpoint_->scenePos(),
00616                                                  QVector2D(0.0f, 0.0f));
00617 
00618         addItem(tempConnection_);
00619 
00620         // Determine all potential endpoints to which the starting endpoint could be connected
00621         // and highlight them.
00622         foreach(QGraphicsItem* item, items())
00623         {
00624             EndpointItem* endpoint = dynamic_cast<EndpointItem*>(item);
00625 
00626             if (endpoint != 0 && endpoint != tempConnEndpoint_ &&
00627                 endpoint->canConnect(tempConnEndpoint_) && tempConnEndpoint_->canConnect(endpoint))
00628             {
00629                 tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.append(endpoint);
00630                 endpoint->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_ALLOWED);
00631             }
00632         }
00633     }
00634     else if (mode_ == MODE_DRAFT)
00635     {
00636         // Find the bottom-most item under the cursor.
00637         QGraphicsItem* item = 0;
00638         QList<QGraphicsItem*> itemList = items(event->scenePos());
00639 
00640         if (!itemList.empty())
00641         {
00642             item = itemList.back();
00643         }
00644 
00645         // If there was no item, then a new mapping component should be added
00646         // to the column under the cursor.
00647         if (item == 0)
00648         {
00649             SystemColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(event->scenePos());
00650 
00651             if (column != 0)
00652             {
00653                 // Determine a unique name for the mapping component.
00654                 addMappingComponent(column, snapPointToGrid(event->scenePos()));
00655                 emit contentChanged();
00656             }
00657         }
00658         // If there was an SW mapping component, then an application item is added.
00659         else if (item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
00660         {
00661             MappingComponentItem* mappingComp = static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item);
00662             
00663             // Create a new MCAPI endpoint component.
00664             QSharedPointer<Component> component(new Component(VLNV()));
00665             component->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW);
00666             component->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS);
00667 
00668             // Add the fixed bus interface to the component.
00669             QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf(new BusInterface());
00670             busIf->setName("app_link");
00671             busIf->setInterfaceMode(General::SLAVE);
00672             busIf->setBusType(VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, "Kactus", "internal", "app_link", "1.0"));
00673 
00674             ProgramEntityItem* progEntity =
00675                 new ProgramEntityItem(component, createInstanceName("unnamed_endpoints"), QString(),
00676                                       QString(), QMap<QString, QString>());
00677             progEntity->setPos(mappingComp->mapFromScene(event->scenePos()));
00678 
00679             QSharedPointer<ProgramEntityAddCommand> cmd(new ProgramEntityAddCommand(mappingComp, progEntity));
00680             connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
00681                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00682             connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
00683                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00684 
00685             editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
00686         }
00687     }
00688     else if (mode_ == MODE_SELECT)
00689     {
00690         // Save the old selection.
00691         QGraphicsItem *oldSelection = 0;
00692 
00693         if (!selectedItems().isEmpty())
00694         {
00695             oldSelection = selectedItems().front();
00696         }
00697 
00698         // Handle the mouse press and bring the new selection to front.
00699         QGraphicsScene::mousePressEvent(event);
00700         //selectionToFront();
00701 
00702         // Retrieve the new selection.
00703         QGraphicsItem *newSelection = 0;
00704 
00705         if (!selectedItems().isEmpty())
00706         {
00707             newSelection = selectedItems().front();
00708         }
00709 
00710         // TODO:
00711         onSelected(newSelection);
00712 
00713         if (oldSelection && oldSelection->type() == EndpointConnection::Type)
00714             if (!selectedItems().size() || selectedItems().first() != oldSelection)
00715                 oldSelection->setZValue(-1000);
00716     }
00717 }
00718 
00719 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00720 // Function: onSelected()
00721 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00722 void EndpointDesignDiagram::onSelected(QGraphicsItem* newSelection)
00723 {
00724     // Activate the correct views when something has been selected.
00725     if (newSelection)
00726     { 
00727         // Check if the selected item was a component.
00728         if (dynamic_cast<ComponentItem*>(newSelection) != 0)
00729         {
00730             emit componentSelected(dynamic_cast<ComponentItem*>(newSelection));
00731         }
00732         else
00733         {
00734             // Otherwise inform others that nothing is currently selected.
00735             emit clearItemSelection();
00736         }
00737     }
00738     else
00739     {
00740         // Clear the selection.
00741         emit clearItemSelection();
00742     }
00743 }
00744 
00745 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00746 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00747 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00748 void EndpointDesignDiagram::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00749 {
00750     // Check if the connect mode is active.
00751     if (mode_ == MODE_CONNECT)
00752     {
00753         // Find out if there is an endpoint currently close to the cursor.
00754         EndpointItem* endpoint = DiagramUtil::snapToItem<EndpointItem>(event->scenePos(), this, GridSize);
00755 
00756         if (tempConnection_)
00757         {
00758             // Check if it was a valid endpoint.
00759             if (endpoint != 0 && tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.contains(endpoint))
00760             {
00761                 // Highlight the endpoint.
00762                 disableHighlight();                
00763                 highlightedEndPoint_ = endpoint;
00764                 highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
00765 
00766             }
00767             // Disable the highlight if there was no valid endpoint close enough.
00768             else
00769             {
00770                 disableHighlight();
00771             }
00772 
00773             // Update the connection.
00774             Q_ASSERT(tempConnection_->getRoute().size() != 0);
00775 
00776             EndpointConnection* newTempConnection_ = 0;
00777 
00778             if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
00779             {
00780                 newTempConnection_ = new EndpointConnection(tempConnEndpoint_, highlightedEndPoint_, false);
00781             }
00782             else
00783             {
00784                 if (event->scenePos().x() > tempConnEndpoint_->scenePos().x())
00785                 {
00786                     tempConnEndpoint_->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_RIGHT);
00787                 }
00788                 else
00789                 {
00790                     tempConnEndpoint_->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_LEFT);
00791                 }
00792 
00793                 newTempConnection_ = new EndpointConnection(tempConnEndpoint_->scenePos(),
00794                                                             tempConnEndpoint_->getDirectionVector(),
00795                                                             snapPointToGrid(event->scenePos()),
00796                                                             QVector2D(0.0f, 0.0f));
00797             }
00798 
00799             removeItem(tempConnection_);
00800             delete tempConnection_;
00801             tempConnection_ = newTempConnection_;
00802 
00803             addItem(tempConnection_);
00804         }
00805         else
00806         {
00807             if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
00808             {
00809                 highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00810                 highlightedEndPoint_ = 0;
00811             }
00812 
00813             if (endpoint != 0 && !endpoint->isConnected())
00814             {
00815                 highlightedEndPoint_ = endpoint;
00816                 highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
00817             }
00818         }
00819     }
00820 
00821     QGraphicsScene::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00822 }
00823 
00824 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00825 // Function: void()
00826 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00827 void EndpointDesignDiagram::disableHighlight()
00828 {
00829     if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
00830     {
00831         if (tempConnEndpoint_ != 0 && highlightedEndPoint_ != tempConnEndpoint_)
00832         {
00833             highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_ALLOWED);
00834         }
00835         else
00836         {
00837             highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00838         }
00839 
00840         highlightedEndPoint_ = 0;
00841     }
00842 }
00843 
00844 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00845 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00846 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00847 void EndpointDesignDiagram::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00848 {
00849     // If there is a connection being drawn while in the connect mode,
00850     // finalize or discard the connection.
00851     if (mode_ == MODE_CONNECT && tempConnection_)
00852     {
00853         // Disable highlights from all potential endpoints.
00854         for (int i = 0 ; i < tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.size(); ++i)
00855         {
00856             tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.at(i)->setHighlight(EndpointItem::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00857         }
00858         tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.clear();
00859 
00860         EndpointItem* endpoint = DiagramUtil::snapToItem<EndpointItem>(event->scenePos(), this, GridSize);
00861 
00862         // Check if there is no endpoint close enough to the cursor or the
00863         // endpoints cannot be connected together.
00864         if (endpoint == 0 || endpoint == tempConnEndpoint_ ||
00865             !endpoint->canConnect(tempConnEndpoint_) ||
00866             !tempConnEndpoint_->canConnect(endpoint))
00867         {
00868             removeItem(tempConnection_);
00869             delete tempConnection_;
00870             tempConnection_ = 0;
00871             tempConnEndpoint_ = 0;
00872         }
00873         else 
00874         {
00875             if (tempConnection_->connectEnds())
00876             {
00877                 connect(tempConnection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00878 
00879                 QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndpointConnectionAddCommand(this, tempConnection_));
00880                 editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
00881 
00882                 tempConnection_ = 0;
00883                 tempConnEndpoint_ = 0;
00884                 emit contentChanged();
00885             }
00886             else
00887             {
00888                 delete tempConnection_;
00889                 tempConnection_ = 0;
00890                 tempConnEndpoint_ = 0;
00891             }
00892         }
00893     }
00894 
00895     // Process the normal mouse release event.
00896     QGraphicsScene::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00897 }
00898 
00899 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00900 // Function: onVerticalScroll()
00901 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00902 void EndpointDesignDiagram::onVerticalScroll(qreal y)
00903 {
00904     layout_->setOffsetY(y);
00905 }
00906 
00907 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00908 // Function: wheelEvent()
00909 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00910 void EndpointDesignDiagram::wheelEvent(QGraphicsSceneWheelEvent *event)
00911 {
00912     if (event->modifiers() == Qt::CTRL)
00913     {
00914         EndpointDesignWidget* doc = static_cast<EndpointDesignWidget*>(parent());
00915         QGraphicsView* view = doc->getView();
00916 
00917         // Retrieve the center point in scene coordinates.
00918         //QPointF origCenterPos = view->mapToScene(view->rect().center());
00919         QPointF centerPos = itemsBoundingRect().center();
00920 
00921         // Set the zoom level and center the view.
00922         doc->setZoomLevel(doc->getZoomLevel() + event->delta() / 12);
00923 
00924         view->centerOn(centerPos);
00925         event->accept();
00926     }
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00931 // Function: saveHierarchy()
00932 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00933 bool EndpointDesignDiagram::saveHierarchy() const
00934 {
00935     // Check for unpackaged components.
00936     QList<QString> unpackagedNames;
00937 
00938     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, items())
00939     {
00940         ComponentItem* swCompItem = dynamic_cast<ComponentItem*>(item);
00941 
00942         if (swCompItem != 0 && !swCompItem->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid()) 
00943         {
00944             unpackagedNames.append(swCompItem->name());
00945         }
00946     }
00947 
00948     // If there were unpacked components, show a message box and do not save.
00949     if (!unpackagedNames.empty())
00950     {
00951         QString detailMessage = tr("The following components must be packaged before the system can be saved:");
00952 
00953         foreach (QString const& name, unpackagedNames)
00954         {
00955             detailMessage += "\n * " + name;
00956         }
00957 
00958         TabDocument* doc = static_cast<TabDocument*>(parent());
00959 
00960         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00961                            tr("System ") + doc->getDocumentName() + 
00962                            tr(" cannot be saved because some component(s) are unpackaged."),
00963                            QMessageBox::Ok, (QWidget*)parent());
00964         msgBox.setDetailedText(detailMessage);
00965         msgBox.exec();
00966         return false;
00967     }
00968 
00969     // Go through all graphics items and save the mapping components.
00970     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, items())
00971     {
00972         if (item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
00973         {
00974             MappingComponentItem* mappingCompItem = static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item);
00975 
00976             if (!mappingCompItem->save(lh_))
00977             {
00978                 return false;
00979             }
00980         }
00981     }
00982 
00983     return true;
00984 }
00985 
00986 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00987 // Function: createDesign()
00988 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00989 QSharedPointer<Design> EndpointDesignDiagram::createDesign(VLNV const& vlnv)
00990 {
00991     QSharedPointer<Design> design(new Design(vlnv));
00992 
00993     QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances;
00994     QList<Design::Interconnection> interconnections;
00995     QList<Design::ColumnDesc> columns;
00996 
00997     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, items())
00998     {
00999         if (item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
01000         {
01001             MappingComponentItem* mappingCompItem = qgraphicsitem_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item);
01002 
01003             Design::ComponentInstance instance(mappingCompItem->name(), mappingCompItem->displayName(),
01004                                                mappingCompItem->description(),
01005                                                *mappingCompItem->componentModel()->getVlnv(),
01006                                                mappingCompItem->scenePos());
01007             instance.imported = mappingCompItem->isImported();
01008             instance.configurableElementValues = mappingCompItem->getConfigurableElements();
01009             instance.mcapiNodeID = mappingCompItem->getID();
01010 
01011             instances.append(instance);
01012         }
01013         else if (item->type() == EndpointConnection::Type)
01014         {
01015             EndpointConnection* conn = static_cast<EndpointConnection*>(item);
01016 
01017             Design::Interface iface1(conn->getEndpoint1()->getParentMappingComp()->name(),
01018                                      conn->getEndpoint1()->getFullName());
01019             Design::Interface iface2(conn->getEndpoint2()->getParentMappingComp()->name(),
01020                                      conn->getEndpoint2()->getFullName());
01021             interconnections.append(Design::Interconnection(conn->getName(), iface1, iface2, conn->getRoute()));
01022         }
01023     }
01024 
01025     foreach (SystemColumn* column, layout_->getColumns())
01026     {
01027         columns.append(Design::ColumnDesc(column->getName(), COLUMN_CONTENT_CUSTOM, 0));
01028     }
01029 
01030     design->setComponentInstances(instances);
01031     design->setInterconnections(interconnections);
01032     design->setColumns(columns);   
01033 
01034     return design;
01035 }
01036 
01037 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01038 // Function: createInstanceName()
01039 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01040 QString EndpointDesignDiagram::createInstanceName(QString const& baseName)
01041 {
01042     // Determine a unique name by using a running number.
01043     int runningNumber = 0;
01044     QString name = baseName + "_" + QString::number(runningNumber);
01045 
01046     while (instanceNames_.contains(name))
01047     {
01048         ++runningNumber;
01049         name = baseName + "_" + QString::number(runningNumber);
01050     }
01051 
01052     instanceNames_.append(name);
01053     return name;
01054 }
01055 
01056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01057 // Function: createInstanceName()
01058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01059 QString EndpointDesignDiagram::createInstanceName(QSharedPointer<Component> component)
01060 {
01061     QString instanceName = component->getVlnv()->getName();
01062     instanceName.remove(QString(".comp"));
01063     return createInstanceName(instanceName);
01064 }
01065 
01066 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01067 // Function: addColumn()
01068 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01069 void EndpointDesignDiagram::addColumn(QString const& name)
01070 {
01071     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new SystemColumnAddCommand(layout_.data(), name));
01072     editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
01073 }
01074 
01075 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01076 // Function: ()
01077 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01078 MappingComponentItem* EndpointDesignDiagram::getMappingComponent(QString const& instanceName)
01079 {
01080     // Search for a SW mapping component with the given instance name.
01081     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, items())
01082     {
01083         if (item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
01084         {
01085             MappingComponentItem* mappingCompItem = static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item);
01086 
01087             if (mappingCompItem->name() == instanceName)
01088             {
01089                 return mappingCompItem;
01090             }
01091         }
01092     }
01093 
01094     // The component was not found.
01095     emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 was not found within design").arg(instanceName));
01096     return 0;
01097 }
01098 
01099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01100 // Function: mouseDoubleClickEvent()
01101 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01102 void EndpointDesignDiagram::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
01103 {
01104     // Allow double click only when the mode is select.
01105     if (mode_ != MODE_SELECT)
01106     {
01107         return;
01108     }
01109 
01110     // Find the item under the cursor.
01111     QGraphicsItem *item = itemAt(snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->scenePos()));
01112 
01113     if (item == 0)
01114     {
01115         return;
01116     }
01117 
01118     // This fixes the problem when the user click above a text label or a pixmap but
01119     // actually wants to select the parent item (such as the actual component, not its label).
01120     while (item->parentItem() != 0 &&
01121            (item->type() == QGraphicsTextItem::Type || item->type() == QGraphicsPixmapItem::Type))
01122     {
01123         item = item->parentItem();
01124     }
01125 
01126     if (item->type() == AppPlaceholderItem::Type && !isProtected())
01127     {
01128         ProgramEntityItem* progEntity = static_cast<ProgramEntityItem*>(item->parentItem());
01129         createApplication(progEntity);
01130 
01131     }
01132     else if (item->type() == PlatformPlaceholderItem::Type && !isProtected())
01133     {
01134         MappingComponentItem* mappingCompItem = static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item->parentItem());
01135         createPlatformComponent(mappingCompItem);
01136     }
01137     else if (item->type() == ApplicationItem::Type)
01138     {
01139         ApplicationItem* appItem = static_cast<ApplicationItem*>(item);
01140 
01141         if (!appItem->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
01142         {
01143             if (!isProtected())
01144             {
01145                 packetizeSWComponent(appItem, tr("Application"));
01146             }
01147         }
01148         else
01149         {
01150             emit openComponent(*appItem->componentModel()->getVlnv());
01151         }
01152     }
01153     else if (item->type() == PlatformComponentItem::Type)
01154     {
01155         PlatformComponentItem* platformCompItem = static_cast<PlatformComponentItem*>(item);
01156 
01157         if (!platformCompItem->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
01158         {
01159             if (!isProtected())
01160             {
01161                 packetizeSWComponent(platformCompItem, tr("SW Platform"));
01162             }
01163         }
01164         else
01165         {
01166             emit openComponent(*platformCompItem->componentModel()->getVlnv());
01167         }
01168     }
01169     else if (item->type() == ProgramEntityItem::Type)
01170     {
01171         ProgramEntityItem* progEntity = static_cast<ProgramEntityItem*>(item);
01172 
01173         if (!progEntity->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
01174         {
01175             if (!isProtected())
01176             {
01177                 packetizeSWComponent(progEntity, tr("Endpoints"));
01178             }
01179         }
01180         else
01181         {
01182             emit openComponent(*progEntity->componentModel()->getVlnv());
01183         }
01184     }
01185 }
01186 
01187 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01188 // Function: createApplication()
01189 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01190 void EndpointDesignDiagram::createApplication(ProgramEntityItem* progEntity)
01191 {
01192     // Create an application component without a valid vlnv.
01193     QSharedPointer<Component> comp = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component());
01194     comp->setVlnv(VLNV());
01195     comp->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW);
01196     comp->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION);
01197 
01198     // Add the fixed bus interface to the component.
01199     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf(new BusInterface());
01200     busIf->setName("app_link");
01201     busIf->setInterfaceMode(General::MASTER);
01202     busIf->setBusType(VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, "Kactus", "internal", "app_link", "1.0"));
01203 
01204     comp->addBusInterface(busIf);
01205 
01206     // Ask the user if he/she wants to generate template code based on the endpoints.
01207     QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Question, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01208                        tr("Do you want to auto-generate template code based on the endpoints?"),
01209                        QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, (QWidget*)parent());
01210 
01211     bool sourceCreated = false;
01212 
01213     if (msgBox.exec() == QMessageBox::Yes)
01214     {
01215         // Ask the user where to save the source file.
01216         QString filename = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName((QWidget*)parent(), tr("Save Source File"),
01217             QString(), tr("C Source Files (*.c)"));
01218 
01219         if (!filename.isEmpty())
01220         {
01221             progEntity->createSource(filename);
01222 
01223             FileSet* fileSet = new FileSet();
01224             fileSet->setName("cSources");
01225             File* file = new File(filename, fileSet);
01226             file->addFileType("cSource");
01227             fileSet->addFile(file);
01228 
01229             comp->addFileSet(fileSet);
01230             sourceCreated = true;
01231         }
01232     }
01233 
01234     ApplicationItem* app = new ApplicationItem(comp, createInstanceName("unnamed_app"),
01235                                                QString(), QString(), QMap<QString, QString>(), progEntity);
01236     connect(app, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)),
01237         this, SIGNAL(openSource(ProgramEntityItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01238 
01239     // Create the undo command and execute it.
01240     QSharedPointer<ApplicationAddCommand> cmd(new ApplicationAddCommand(progEntity, app));
01241     connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
01242         this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01243     connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
01244         this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01245 
01246     editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
01247 
01248     if (sourceCreated)
01249     {
01250         emit openSource(progEntity);
01251     }
01252 }
01253 
01254 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01255 // Function: packetizeApplication()
01256 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01257 void EndpointDesignDiagram::packetizeSWComponent(ComponentItem* item, QString const& itemTypeName)
01258 {
01259     // Request the user to set the vlnv.
01260     NewObjectDialog dialog(lh_, VLNV::COMPONENT, false, (QWidget*)parent());
01261     dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Add ") + itemTypeName + tr(" to Library"));
01262 
01263     if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
01264     {
01265         return;
01266     }
01267 
01268     VLNV vlnv = dialog.getVLNV();
01269     item->componentModel()->setVlnv(vlnv);
01270 
01271     // Write the model to file.
01272     lh_->writeModelToFile(dialog.getPath(), item->componentModel());
01273 
01274     // Update the diagram component.
01275     item->updateComponent();
01276 
01277     // Create an undo command.
01278     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new SWComponentPacketizeCommand(item, vlnv));
01279     editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
01280 
01281     // Ask the user if he wants to complete the component.
01282     QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Question, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01283         "Do you want to continue packaging the " + itemTypeName.toLower() + " completely?",
01284         QMessageBox::NoButton, (QWidget*)parent());
01285     msgBox.setInformativeText("Pressing Continue opens up the component editor.");
01286     QPushButton* btnContinue = msgBox.addButton(tr("Continue"), QMessageBox::ActionRole);
01287     msgBox.addButton(tr("Skip"), QMessageBox::RejectRole);
01288 
01289     msgBox.exec();
01290 
01291     if (msgBox.clickedButton() == btnContinue)
01292     {
01293         // Open up the component editor.
01294         emit openComponent(*item->componentModel()->getVlnv());
01295     }
01296 }
01297 
01298 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01299 // Function: createPlatformComponent()
01300 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01301 void EndpointDesignDiagram::createPlatformComponent(MappingComponentItem* mappingCompItem)
01302 {
01303     // Create a platform component without a valid vlnv.
01304     QSharedPointer<Component> comp = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component());
01305     comp->setVlnv(VLNV());
01306     comp->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW);
01307     comp->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM);
01308 
01309     PlatformComponentItem* platformComp = new PlatformComponentItem(comp,
01310                                                                     createInstanceName("unnamed_platform"),
01311                                                                     QString(), QString(),
01312                                                                     QMap<QString, QString>(),
01313                                                                     mappingCompItem);
01314     connect(platformComp, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
01315 
01316     // Create the undo command and execute it.
01317     QSharedPointer<PlatformCompAddCommand> cmd(new PlatformCompAddCommand(mappingCompItem, platformComp));
01318     connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)),
01319         this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01320     connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)),
01321         this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01322 
01323     editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
01324 }
01325 
01326 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

01328 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01329 SystemColumnLayout* EndpointDesignDiagram::getColumnLayout()

01331     return layout_.data();
01332 }

01334 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01335 // Function: onComponentInstanceAdded()
01336 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01337 void EndpointDesignDiagram::onComponentInstanceAdded(ComponentItem* item)
01338 {
01339     instanceNames_.append(item->name());
01340 
01341     if (item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
01342     {
01343         nodeIDFactory_.usedID(static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item)->getID());
01344     }
01345 }
01346 
01347 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01348 // Function: onComponentInstanceRemoved()
01349 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01350 void EndpointDesignDiagram::onComponentInstanceRemoved(ComponentItem* item)
01351 {
01352     instanceNames_.removeAll(item->name());
01353 
01354     if (item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
01355     {
01356         nodeIDFactory_.freeID(static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item)->getID());
01357     }
01358 }

01360 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01361 // Function: getEditProvider()
01362 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01363 GenericEditProvider& EndpointDesignDiagram::getEditProvider()
01364 {
01365     return editProvider_;
01366 }
01367 
01368 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01369 // Function: setProtection()
01370 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01371 void EndpointDesignDiagram::setProtection(bool locked)
01372 {
01373     locked_ = locked;
01374     clearSelection();
01375     emit clearItemSelection();
01376 }
01377 
01378 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01379 // Function: isProtected()
01380 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01381 bool EndpointDesignDiagram::isProtected() const
01382 {
01383     return locked_;
01384 }
01385

01387 // Function: parent()
01388 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01389 EndpointDesignWidget* EndpointDesignDiagram::parent() const
